- Distribution: [e.g., Debian 11, Ubuntu 22.04, Arch Linux]

**System Resources:**

- RAM: [e.g., 4GB]

- Disk Space: [e.g., 50GB available]

## Pre-Installation Checks

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

- [ ] System meets minimum requirements (CPU, RAM, disk space)
- [ ] Have root/sudo access
- [ ] All required ports are available (80, 443, 5432, etc.)
- [ ] Firewall rules configured if necessary
- [ ] No conflicting services running (PostgreSQL, Nginx, etc.)
